data.title: 6 Portugal within the European Antifascist Movement, 1922–39
data.meta_description: 6 Portugal within the European Antifascist Movement, 1922–39 was published in Rethinking Antifascism on page 114.
data.text:
Clímaco, Cristina. "6 Portugal within the European Antifascist Movement, 1922–39". Rethinking Antifascism: History, Memory and Politics, 1922 to the Present, edited by Hugo García, Mercedes Yusta, Xavier Tabet and Cristina Clímaco, New York, Oxford: Berghahn Books, 2016, pp. 114-132. https://doi.org/10.1515/9781785331398-008
